name: Close to the edge
description:
Close to the edge is a fan game inspired by the worlds and art of Roger Dean. Made in Chile for the Pico 8 fantasy console.

Listen to my new Album now!

Spotify

Social media:

Facebook

Instragram

Youtube

Also includes secret 2 player coop mode (2nd player press "jump" (Q) anytime) and  Hard mode (press "down" on title screen).
